array_size.body: Use ARRAY_SIZE macro, rather than explicitly coding some variant of it yourself.

vma_pages.body: Use vma_pages function on vma object instead of explicit computation.

setup_timer.body: Use setup_timer function instead of initializing timer with the function.

pool_zalloc-simple.body: Use *_pool_zalloc rather than *_pool_alloc followed by memset with 0.

of_table.body: Make sure (of/i2c/platform)_device_id tables are NULL terminated.

alloc_cast.body: Remove casting the values returned by memory allocation functions like kmalloc, kzalloc, kmem_cache_alloc, kmem_cache_zalloc etc.

boolinit.subject: Fix bool initialization/comparsion
boolinit.body: Bool initializations should use true and false. Bool tests don't need comparisons.
